events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit and I want to request a refund for the item I purchased.
The system has classified this case under the refund category based on keywords detected in the customer's message.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned to the store or shipped back already?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I haven’t sent the jacket back yet but I plan to drop it at the nearest post office tomorrow.
Thank you for the info. Once we receive the returned jacket, we will process your refund within 5-7 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the prompt response and clear instructions!
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund for your jacket. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can do.
As there has been no further response, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
